meanings.definition: Behavior involving physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The violences in the movie were so intense, it made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to speak out against the violences happening in their neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggerated violences always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The storm unleashed its full violences upon the small town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's vivid description of the violences in the story left a lasting impression on the students.
